name: Terrible Unfinished FPS Prototype
description:
This was a game I had been making on and off for a few months. Long story short the files got corrupted.

SO BE WARNED, THERE ARE MANY WEIRD BUGS AND UNFINSHED THINGS!

I had a ton of ideas and features I still wanted to add, but most of the progress I made got completely ruined.  So there will be no further development of this game, as this was the last build I had made before its demise.

Lessons Learned:

1. Always backup your projects.

2. Don't procrastinate crucial game features.

How To Play

Left Mouse = Shoot

Scroll Wheel = Switch to Pistol

Q = Grenades

Backspace = Restart

There are also these Beacon things. (They have 3 purple lights on them and are often on the top of buildings) Press E to activate them. (They were going to be an objective but they don't do anything in this build.
